mapper.sql: ID, STUDY_DATE, STUDY_CONTENT, DIC_STUDY_TYPE_KEY, STUDY_SHOW, NOTE, STUDY_TIME, FILE_PATH, ASSESS_MANAGER, GROUP_ID, PART_PERSON, NO_PART_PERSON, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG,STUDY_TYPE, (select g.name from SYS_GROUP g where g.id=GROUP_ID) groupName
mapper.insert: insert into SF_STUDY (ID, STUDY_DATE, STUDY_CONTENT, DIC_STUDY_TYPE_KEY, STUDY_SHOW, NOTE, STUDY_TIME, FILE_PATH, ASSESS_MANAGER, GROUP_ID, PART_PERSON, NO_PART_PERSON, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, STUDY_TYPE, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicStudyTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studyShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{studyTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noPartPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{studyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SF_STUDY
ID,
STUDY_DATE,
STUDY_CONTENT,
DIC_STUDY_TYPE_KEY,
STUDY_SHOW,
NOTE,
STUDY_TIME,

GROUP_ID,

NO_PART_PERSON,

UPDATED,
UPDATER,
DEL_FLAG,
STUDY_TYPE,

#{studyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicStudyTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update SF_STUDY
STUDY_DATE = #{studyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STUDY_CONTENT = #{studyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_STUDY_TYPE_KEY = #{dicStudyTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDY_SHOW = #{studyShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB},
STUDY_TIME = #{studyTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSESS_MANAGER = #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_PERSON = #{partPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NO_PART_PERSON = #{noPartPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STUDY_TYPE = #{studyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_STUDY set STUDY_DATE = #{studyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STUDY_CONTENT = #{studyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_STUDY_TYPE_KEY = #{dicStudyTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDY_SHOW = #{studyShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB}, STUDY_TIME = #{studyTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESS_MANAGER = #{assessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_PERSON = #{partPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NO_PART_PERSON = #{noPartPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STUDY_TYPE=#{studyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SYS_ACCOUNT s on g.id=s.group_id where s.id=t.CREATER)
